MODIFICATION HISTORY


Logitech Gaming G-key SDK

  1.01.001
    First version of SDK.

  1.02.001
    Added support for G710.
    Made modifications for simplified API.
    Added polling of current button/G-key presses (in addition to callback).

  1.02.002
    Added extra initialization function for using SDK without callback.

  1.02.003
    Exact same as 1.02.002, with addition of documentation for UDK developers.

  1.02.004
    Added extra initialization for using SDK with Unity Engine
    Changed the calling convenction for the callback function for integration with Unity Engine
